title: Can't patch
body: Everytime I try and patch it freezes, then closes and doesn't open again, but LoL is still running in task manager. Closing it in task manager and re-opening client just says they've restored it to an older version and will now try to patch to the latest update, leading to the same problem.

replies.body: It sounds like there might be some damaged patcher files hanging around somewhere, and those files keep causing the patch to fail. Try grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with a **reinstall and clean uninstall**.
